description:
Create professional looking book covers in minutes WITHOUT hiring a graphic designer! Detailed instructions and templates included with this course! Perfect for any level of Photoshop user!

Hiring a graphic designer to create your Kindle ebook covers can be expensive! And doing it on your own may be more difficult than it appears! This course will walk you step-by-step through the process of designing your own professional looking Kindle book covers.

What makes this Ebook covers design tutorial course different is that it will NOT teach you how to make a cover from scratch! That's the boring stuff! Instead, the initial set-up is already done for you leaving you to the fun stuff like adding images, editing text and changing colors!

Included Templates

This Ebook covers design tutorial course includes six Photoshop cover templates based on actual covers from Amazon and designed to be easy to customize. These templates are built with Photoshop Actions which are stored right inside the Photoshop interface. You’ll never have to search your hard drive to find a blank cover template because they'll always be available right inside Photoshop. Complete instructions are included for installing the Actions. Don’t worry if you’ve never heard of Photoshop Actions before. They are really easy to use!

Templates are built at 1674 x 2500 pixels (6x9 cover size) and are ideal for higher resolution Kindle devices.

Detailed Video Tutorials

Each template includes its own video tutorial. These tutorials explain in detail how to get the most out of each template. With over 2 hours of content, there are many helpful suggestions and instructions on how to achieve different looks. You'll also learn a lot of Photoshop skills after taking this Ebook covers design tutorial course!

Template Features

  • Professional Looking
  • Time Saving
  • Built-in Backgrounds
  • Built-in Banners
  • Text Built in Place
  • Completely Customizable
  • Easy to Make Changes
  • Special Effects

Bonus Utility Included

Students of this course will also receive a bonus Cover Sizer image utility that will easily re-size completed covers to optimal resolutions for embedding on webpages and social networks. This image utility will also work with pictures from a digital camera reducing them in size for emailing.

About The Instructor

This Ebook covers design tutorial course is taught by Harlan Yee, an independent publisher, internet business developer and motion graphic designer. Harlan has over 20 years experience in television broadcast and video production. You can follow his latest projects including website development, digital product creation and online marketing at FreelanceDoodle.com .

</p>
title: How to Create Bestselling Kindle Ebook Covers - Series 1
